section.title: Extjs dependency
section.para:
Currently DNet runs with Extjs 3.3.0, to change it do the following:
Download the osgi package from from http://dnet.nan21.net/maven2repo/net/nan21/osgi/net.nan21.osgi.extjs/ and copy it to VIRGO_HOME/repository/usr. These packages are versioned according to the Extjs version which is contained.
Update in net.nan21.dnet.properties the url.ui.extjs.lib.extjs property with the new value

Alternatively can be deployed to a different location, in this case set the url.ui.extjs.lib.extjs to point to the url of your deployment for example http://domain/jslibs/extjs/3.3.0 or whatever it may be.
